.. :changelog:

=======
History
=======

0.3.2 (2018-03-24)
---------------------

* Better compatibility to modern pip versions.


0.3.1 (2015-07-24)
---------------------

* Fix platform-dependent loading on Python 2.


0.3.0 (2015-05-05)
---------------------

* Always raise LocationError on resolution error.
* Packaging problem fixed.


0.2.0 (2015-05-02)
---------------------

* Add log location support.


0.1.0 (2015-05-02)
---------------------

* First release on PyPI.
